messages.welcome:
{#server}*** This Server uses the ManiaKarma world Track vote system at {#highlite}$l[{1}]{2}$l
{#server}*** Type {#highlite}/karma help{#server} for more info.
messages.uptodate_ok: {#emotic}*** This ManiaKarma plugin version {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} is up to date.
messages.uptodate_new: {#emotic}*** New ManiaKarma plugin version {#highlite}{1}{#emotic} available from {#highlite}{2}
messages.uptodate_failed: {#error}*** Could not check plugin version, connection failed.
messages.karma_your_vote: {#karma}, you think this Track is {#highlite}{1}{#karma}. Command {#highlite}{2}
messages.karma_voted>: {#server}> {#karma}You have already voted for this Track
messages.karma_remind>: {#server}> {#karma}Remember to vote karma for this Track! Type {#highlite}/karma help{#server} for more info.
messages.karma_require_finish>: {#server}> {#error}You need to finish this Track at least {#highlite}$I {1}{#error} time{2} before being able to vote!
messages.karma_list_help: {#server}> {#emotic}Use {#highlite}/list{#emotic} first - Type {#highlite}/list help{#emotic} for more info.
messages.karma_help:
{#server}This is the World Track vote System, with this system all votes are stored in a central Database and not only at this Server. The Karma of each Track {#server}are from all votes Worldwide.

The Track-Authors and the Server-Admins need to know how good the Tracks are, so please vote all Tracks!

{#server}You can vote with:
  {#highlite}/+++{#server} for fantastic
  {#highlite}/++{#server}   for beautiful
  {#highlite}/+{#server}     for good
  {#highlite}/-{#server}      for bad
  {#highlite}/--{#server}     for poor
  {#highlite}/---{#server}    for waste

{#server}You can also use the {#highlite}Karma-Widget{#server} or the {#highlite}Reminder-Window{#server} at the Scoretable.

{#server}Enter {#highlite}/karma{#server} to see the Karma of the current Track.

{#server}Enter {#highlite}/karma details{#server} to see the detailed Karma of the current Track.
messages.karma_reminder_at_score: How did you like this Track?
messages.karma_show_opinion: {#server}>> {#highlite}[{1}]{#server} thinks this Track is {#highlite}{2}{#server}! What do you think?
messages.karma_show_undecided: {#server}>> {#highlite}[{1}]{#server} is {#highlite}undecided{#server} about this Track. What do you think?
messages.lottery_mail_body:
{#karma}Congratulations! You have won at the ManiaKarma lottery on {#highlite}{1}{#karma}!
You won {#highlite}{2} Coppers{#karma}!!!

$L[tmtp://#addfavourite={3}]Click here to add this server to your favorites!$L
messages.lottery_player_won: {#server}> {1}$Z$S{#karma} won the ManiaKarma lottery and got {#highlite}{2} Coppers{#karma}!!! Congratulations!
messages.lottery_low_coppers: {#server}> {#message}The ManiaKarma lottery has too few Coppers, please donate some Coppers to enable lottery.
messages.lottery_to_few_players: {#server}> {#message}The ManiaKarma lottery did not draw a winner, because there are not enough players online or too few voted.
messages.lottery_total_player_win: {#server}> {#karma}You have won a total of {#highlite}{1} Coppers{#karma} until now.>
messages.lottery_help: {#server}Enter {#highlite}/karma lottery{#server} to see your current total win at ManiaKarma lottery (lottery only available for TMU players).
